app.name: Cordial Support
app.long_description: This app allows users to subscribe/unsubscribe cordial contacts as well as update any specified contact attributes
app.installation_instructions: Configure the following app settings, then click Install:...
app.title: Cordial

api_token.label: API Token
api_token.helpText: You can get your API token from the Cordial Admin under the account dropdown API Keys. Generate your token by base 64 encoding your token with a colon at the end (Basic Auth with the key as the user and an empty password). Example you can run to generate your token in your browser's javascript console: btoa(YOUR_TOKEN + ':')

allowed_contact_attributes.label: Allowed Contact Attributes
allowed_contact_attributes.helpText: Add each contact attribute key you want to display on separate lines

enable_events.label: Enable Events (Beta)
enable_events.helpText: Whether or not you would like to display a contact's event data
